message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $10000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to counter with an offer of $10500 for the product.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still looking to get a good deal for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10750.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $10600 for the product.

I'm starting to get a little concerned that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, Bob. However, I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10700.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to counter with an offer of $10650 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10800.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions and my budget constraints, I would like to make one final counteroffer of $10750 for the product.
